alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, east central Lexington and central Richland Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over SC State Farmer`s Market, or over Cayce, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, McEntire Air Base, Oak Grove, St. Andrews, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Hopkins, Horrel Hill, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Woodfield, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Fort Jackson, and Five Points. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 2 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 76 and 77. Interstate 26 between mile markers 110 and 122. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
